text:
October 11, 1955
Cm
Miss Marguerite Fleming
Radio Station KSLH
1517 South Theresa Avenue
St, Louis, Missouri
Dear Marguerites
Harold Hill and I will arrive in Chicago some time during the morning
of October 25, so I imagine we *11 both be there for the Regional Con¬
ference — if he hasn*t told you already. Dr. Skomia says he *11 be
there whenever he»s not tied up with Board. Guess you have that prob¬
lem too.
X*m asking all members of the school committee if they*ll be able to
get together for dinner with Hill, me, possibly Skornia, that evening.
Hope this fits in okay and most can make it.
Sincerely,
John Holt
Network Manager
JH:cr
P.S. Mr. Robert L. Peterson
lli6 Clapboard Bridge Road
Greenwich, Conn.
He is an associate professor (in Business Management), but not a
Ph.D.
